transaction.title: Latest update to transaction
transaction.description: Realtime stream of user transaction updates.

contract_id.description: It is the contract id Example: 4867502908

transaction_id.description: It is the transaction id. Every contract (buy or sell) or payment has a unique id. Example: 10867502908

amount.description: It is the amount of transaction performed Example: -83.2300

id.description: A stream id that can be used to cancel this stream using the Forget request. Example: 1d6651e7d599bce6c54bd71a8283e579

transaction_time.description: Time at which transaction was performed, for buy its purchase time, for sell its sell time

purchase_time.description: Time at which contract was purchased, present only for sell transaction

date_expiry.description: Epoch value of the expiry time of the contract. Please note that in case of buy transaction this is approximate value not exact one.

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
